mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe(recipeno, memberno, foodBinary, content, rdate) VALUES (recipe_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberno}, #{foodBinary}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT recipeno, memberno, foodBinary, content, TO_CHAR(rdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as rdate FROM recipe WHERE memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY recipeno DESC
